channel.title: Made a sever but what next im not admin or anything pplease help
channel.description: yo i made my sever and logged into it and im not admin or anything and i dont know what to do and i need help with a ip for ham and with no ip please help :confused: :|

item.title: Made a sever but what next im not admin or anything pplease help
item.dc:creator: @Tallien Tallien
item.description:
@Tallien wrote:

It’s usualy for the purposes when people see an admin they act all good so thats why you can make undercover admins, you set their player rights on 4 and They have the same purposes as an owner, Teleport, spawn, kick , ban, ip ban ect… its just glitched so they dont see the crown

Read full topic
item.source: Made a sever but what next im not admin or anything pplease help

item.title: Made a sever but what next im not admin or anything pplease help
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

Hamachi:

Step 1: Download the program at www.hamachi.cc

Step 2: Open it up, make a server name & password.

Step 3: Get a “No-Ip” or use the “Ip” that was given to you.

No-Ip:

Step 1: Go to www.no-ip.com

Step 2: Register.

Step 3: Run server, put your “No-Ip” and enjoy.
[hr]

item.source: Made a sever but what next im not admin or anything pplease help

item.title: Made a sever but what next im not admin or anything pplease help
item.dc:creator: @Tallien Tallien
item.description:
@Tallien wrote:

Step 1:

Change your appearance and fight a little so it makes a file

Step 2:

Open up your folder and open characters

Step 3:

Find your File

Step 4:

In [Character] In the 4th line it should say

character-rights = 0

Step 5:

Change the rights to the correct number

0 = Normal Player 1 = Moderator (Silver Crown) 2 = Admin (Golden Crown) 3 = Owner (Golden Crown) 4 = Undercover Admin Purpose (No Crown but same rights as Admin)

Step 6: Compile and have fun

Note: Owners can not see their own crown, Look in the tutorial section and find one that says “Owners can see their own Crown”

Read full topic
